abstract: JPMorgan Chase and Commonwealth Bank of Australia agreed to buy the United Utilities power-distribution unit in Britain for £1.14 billion ($2.34 billion), adding electricity customers to their British water assets.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase and Commonwealth Bank of Australia agreed to buy the United Utilities power-distribution unit in Britain for £1.14 billion ($2.34 billion), adding electricity customers to their British water assets.
